Description:
Easy Coastal Living in Peaceful Location
Positioned on a corner block in the peaceful river-end of town, this white weatherboard home with bright interior, high ceilings and warm hardwood flooring is the perfect beach house. Young families will love the quiet neighbourhood and nearby Village Park, while investors will see potential for a low-maintenance holiday home or short-term rental.
North-facing, the verandah provides a delightful spot for a morning coffee; dense foliage promotes privacy. The characterful stained glass front door is welcoming, and reveals the entranceway and the two minor bedrooms, each with BIRs.
The kitchen comes with Westinghouse oven/cooktop, dishwasher, and sociable island bench overlooking the lofty, open-plan dining/living space. With its garden outlook and fresh white walls, the main living is a relaxing place to retreat after a day at the beach.
The master bedroom boasts a WIR and ensuite with corner shower, and the main bathroom comes with over-bath shower and vanity, with a separate WC ensuring privacy. Adjacent, the laundry leads to a single lock-up garage with front and rear roller door access. Outdoor entertaining is encouraged in the private, undercover paved courtyard, and a patch of lawn offers a spot for the kids or pets to frolick.
Parks, playgrounds and the stunning Barwon River are all just a short walk away, and the main streets boutiques, cafes and amenities are not much further. Enjoy all that Barwon Heads and surrounds have to offer, in this low-maintenance beach house with easy coastal living at its heart. Inspect today!
Insights: 23 Knox Drive, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 32 other 3 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Updated Home on 715m2 Block.
Set on a quiet street within a short distance to the hustle and bustle of High street, Belmont. This ready to move into house on a large 715m2 (approx.) block is sure to impress. The neat garden at the front provides street appeal as you walk down into your own oasis.
As you walk into this 1980s brick home, you feel at home with the lounge room with an air conditioner and a gas log heater on the left and living room with a Vulcan heater on the right. The central kitchen and dining has a great family feel to the place. The neat u-shaped kitchen with stainless steel Fisher and Paykel oven, dish-draw dishwasher and a gas stove top provides a great place to create your feast while surrounded by family and friends. The property is carpeted throughout with plantation shutters and newly painted inside and out. Consisting of 3 bedrooms with built in robes and 2 updated bathrooms, the Master at the rear of the home with ensuite looks out onto a lovely quiet and well established garden.
Need a place to park your caravan? There is a newly built caravan port and carport! Large garden area with vegetable patch and a large water tank and electric pump to keep it watered, and finally a studio/office and workshop complete this home!
Insights: 7 Summit Avenue, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
You Couldn't Ask For More
There are not enough words to describe what an amazing parcel of land this truly is Not only does this vacant allotment of 408m2 offer uninterrupted views and passage to the beautiful Barwon River with all its wonderful scenery and walking trails but also boasts one of the flattest building parcels in Highton making the dream of building your dream home in such a location not only a reality but also extremely affordable.
If you're not won over yet then you will be with the ample number of local amenities handy to this locale; Barrabool Hills plaza, Queens Park golf course, Buckley Falls and Highton Village shopping precinct are all within either walking distance or a short drive. To cap it off you also have quick access to the Geelong Ring road as well as being within 10 minutes of Geelong CBD and zoning to some of Geelong's best schools.
You'll kick yourself if you let this one pass you by, don't hesitate and call today!
Insights: 147 Stoneleigh Crescent, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Superb Family Living Awaits In Old Highton
Embrace blissful family living upon approx. 907m2 in Old Highton. The light-filled living zones and spacious outdoor entertaining deck will delight, while ample off-street parking is a huge plus. Walk to Montpellier P.S, Highton Village, and the Barwon River.
- Open plan living zone and family room overlook the deck
- Kitchen boasts concrete benchtops and a w/in pantry
- Dishwasher and s/steel 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood
- Master BR features deck access, w/in robe, and en suite
- Three additional BRs (one with b/in robes and balcony)
- Study nook, main bathroom, powder room, European laundry
- Two s/system air conditioners, gas wall heater, ceiling fans
- Spacious backyard is home to an outdoor shower and playset
- Double garage and versatile single garage provide parking
- Secure front yard is ideal for storing caravans or boats

Description:
Slice of paradise in exclusive location.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia on 0432 182 271.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://barryplant-production.s3.amazonaws.com/media/documents/COVID-19_Barry_Plant_Information.pdf for more information.
A large slice of the classic 1980's Highton living. This timeless family home is full of character, charm and warmth.
Situated amongst a private treelined Street in Highton's exclusive 'Shoubra Estate'. Sitting on a generous and rare 1087m2 allotment (approx.) the scope is endless. Whether it's extending, plans for a swimming pool (STCA) or just wanting to sit back and enjoy tranquil private surrounds this home ticks all the boxes.
Unassuming, tucked away and quaint from the street view, the large home awaiting beyond the front door is very pleasant surprise. Upon entry be greeted by the funky and timeless sunken lounge, exposed beams and open fire place. Seamlessly flow through to the open plan kitchen and dining space which is drenched in natural light with surrounding garden views.
Flowing further through the parents retreat zone with private lounge space, balcony, large master bedroom, walk in robe and ensuite. The master bedroom with large windows overlooking the Shoubra parkland. You will also find a further two bedrooms and a large central bathroom. Stepping outside you will enjoy not only the huge 1087m2 approx. block, established gardens and ample space to extend or put in a swimming pool (STCA), but you will also find a large workshop with under house storage, the third living space/rumpus room and also the large extended double garage. The Shoubra park just meters from your front door, perfect for walking the dogs, kicking the footy and just enjoying the open, peaceful surrounds.
Located within 5 minutes to the Highton Village shopping with endless cafes, restaurants, boutique shopping, medical facilities and Woolworths shopping. Also just a few minutes to Belmont Shopping (Kmart, Aldi) and Waurn Ponds shopping complex. Within 10 minutes to Pakington Street shopping, the Geelong waterfront, botanical gardens and CDB. Premium schooling at your finger-tips such as Highton Primary, Bellaire Primary, Montpellier Primary, Christian College, The Geelong College just to name a few. Deakin university and Epworth hospital also within 5 minutes. For the Melbourne commuters you will be on the ring road within 5 minutes and in the CBD within the hour, alternatively the Geelong, Marshall and Waurn Ponds train station within 10 minutes drive.
3D Virtual walk through tour available, contact Julia to find out more.
Insights: 34 Remony Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Easy Family Living Awaits In Highton
Superbly located in a peaceful pocket of Highton, this home promises an effortless family lifestyle. Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and a variety of schools are moments away. Enjoy easy access to the Ring Rd, Deakin Uni (Waurn Ponds) and Epworth Hospital.
- Bus provides access to Geelong CBD and Waurn Ponds Station
- Open plan living zone flows onto the sunny alfresco area
- Sunken lounge and formal dining room with side garden access
- Large kitchen is equipped with a b/in pantry and appliances
- Master BR features two b/in robes and en suite
- Two additional BRs with b/in robes and versatile study/4th BR
- Main bathroom, separate toilet, large laundry with storage
- Gas heating and air conditioning provide comfort
- Generous backyard boasts a garden shed and rainwater tanks
- Remote double garage with access to carport/boat storage

Description:
Multiple Options On Offer
Nestled in a coveted address backing onto Jan Juc Creek Reserve this original home reveals potential for a transformation. There is numerous options on offer for the astute purchaser, update & add to your investment portfolio, create a comfortable holiday home, fully renovate & extend to live-in or demolish & build your dream home (STCA). The property is set amongst native shrubbery on a block of approx. 582sqm providing private direct access to the Reserve & is within walking distance to Jan Juc surf beaches, medical centre & eateries.
Open plan living/dining/gas kitchen
Coonara wood heater, air conditioner
Two bedrooms, with built-in-robes
Sitting room/study adjacent to bedroom 2
Bathroom has shower over bath, separate w/c
Laundry providing external access
Expansive deck facing Jan Juc reserve
Large rear yard with gated access to reserve
Off street parking, well fenced yard

Description:
Private Inspections Available
Easy Living With A North-Facing Yard & Caravan Storage!
Whether youre dreaming of owning your own home, searching for a terrific investment, or on the hunt for the perfect downsizer, this home will be at the top of your list! Featuring a north-facing backyard and secure storage space for a caravan or boat, this home is simply charming!
Public transport is a short stroll away, while a walking path provides direct access to Christies Road. The nearby parkland and playground are within easy walking distance - perfect for children and pets who love to run and play. The Bellarine Rail Trail is within close reach, along with the Leopold Sportsmans Club and Leopold P.S. The Gateway Plaza will leave you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the heart of the home, while opening onto the north-facing alfresco deck and outdoor entertaining area. The sheltered alfresco boasts a ceiling fan and café blind, while the sun-drenched outdoor entertaining area features a retractable awning meaning you can enjoy outdoor living in every season! The kitchen will delight with a walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances inc. a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood.
The Master Bedroom overlooks the backyard, with the walk-in robe leading through to the en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to main bathroom, while the separate toilet and laundry with external access complete the layout. Modcons include ducted heating, two split-system air conditioners, and ducted vacuum. Established gardens surround the backyard, which is also home to lush lawn and a garden shed. 3KW of solar panels benefits both the environment and your bank account, while a veggie garden and 2000L rainwater tank promote sustainable living. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access. Dedicated parking for a caravan, boat, or trailer adds the final touch to this fantastic property.
An effortless lifestyle is yours to keep with this Leopold gem! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 19 Morrow Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Space, Lifestyle and super location on approx. 2192sqm
Sale by Fixed Date - 4th May 2020 at 5.00pm. This extraordinary lifestyle property is located in the popular suburb of Waurn Ponds, toward the end of a court and sitting on a huge 2192sqm (approx). Surrounded by beautiful gardens, trees and enjoying a secure and private location the home will accommodate all your family's needs. The beautiful and highly functional residence is thoughtfully designed and showcases a desirable layout.
Featuring 3 living spaces, including formal lounge at the front of the home, moving through to the large open plan kitchen/dining room, plus the flexibility of a rumpus room or 5th bedroom.
4 bedrooms, master includes WIR and ensuite, plus 3 further bedrooms with BIRs and central bathroom.
The stylish kitchen consists of stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and WIP.
From inside to outside youll find an undercover decked pergola, large grassy backyard, basketball area and even your own cricket netting. Summertime will also be very enjoyable around the in-ground solar heated pool and alfresco entertaining area.
Extensive extras in the home include;
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Polished concrete flooring
- 22 Solar panels
- Plantation shutters
- Garaging for up to 4 cars
Perfect for a family seeking room to move in and relax, while not compromising on style. Walking distance to the Waurn Ponds Train Station, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin Uni, Epworth Hospital as well as quick access to the ring road and the surf coast. This home the perfect retreat from the busy world and the ideal spot to escape the rat race.
Insights: 14-15 Chandon Court, Waurn Ponds VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 10 other 5 bedroom house in Waurn Ponds have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Lifestyle & Convenience
Walking distance to the Waurn Ponds Train Station and easy access to the Geelong Ring Road, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin and Epworth is this appealing family home. On offer are three large bedrooms with built-in robes (the main bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite) and are serviced by a central family bathroom. The kitchen is at the heart of the home and is open to a spacious dining and living area. There is a separate family room and undercover alfresco area. Other features include a double garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a secure rear yard. Land size is approximately 595m2.

Description:
Stunning townhouse on Own Title in Prime Belmont!
Nestled in the heart of Belmont, this is an opportunity you won't want to miss.
This quality-built townhouse on its own title is immaculate and ready to move straight into. It has all the features wanted by so many, wide entrance, high ceilings & a spacious feel!
Light & airy open plan living & meals area, kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone benchtops & walk in pantry. There is outdoor access to the private paved courtyard.
The Main bedroom is very spacious & will accommodate a king size bedroom suite, with has a built-in robe & full ensuite. 2 additional bedrooms are generous in size and & have built in robes. The 2nd bathroom is complete with shower and separate toilet.
A large single remote garage has both internal & external access. No expense has been spared for quality. With 3 x S/S units for year-round climate control. This is a fabulous property that will appeal to 1st home buyers, astute investors or retirees looking to downsize! Act now to secure this dream property!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Charming home in quiet court.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia on 0432 182 271.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Nestled in a quiet, tranquil Court in the heart of the ever popular Grovedale, this charming home is awaiting its lucky new owner.
Tucked amongst established gardens sitting comfortably on large 676m2 approx. allotment, this home is ideal market entry, investment or downsize.
This convenient location with all local amenities at your finger-tips. Whether it's a bite to eat at the Grovedale Hotel (who are currently doing amazing take-away) or, the Waurn Ponds shopping mecca of 3216 that has everything from Bunnings, Coles, Aldi & Readings cinemas. Take your pick from Marshall or Waurn Ponds train station for the Melbourne commuters or simply jump onto the Ring Road which will have you in Melbourne within the hour.
Renovated throughout, this neat as a pin home has just had brand new carpet laid. Upon entry land in the light filled living space that flows to the dining and kitchen zone that overlooks the backyard. Further through the home find 3 bedrooms with built in robes, modern central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry with storage space and linen cupboard.
Step outside to the undercover alfresco with BBQ zone, perfect for entertaining. Lush lawns great for kids to play or pets, vegetation including a few fruits trees, perfect for the budding gardener. Additionally offering a shed ideal for extra storage opportunity or for garden tools/hobby space.
Key Features:
676m2 approx. block
Peaceful, quiet Court location
In the same hand for almost 2 decades
Heating & cooling
Lush established gardens, raised box garden
Solar panels
Perfect market entry, downsizer or investment
Light filled bedrooms with robes
Modern appeal and appliances throughout
Single carport and 5.3 x 4.9m powered storage shed in backyard
Close to amenities such as: IGA, Grovedale Hotel, Coles, Aldi & Woolies, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Leisurelink Centre, Supaworld, Officeworks and Bunnings.
Close to schools such as: Grovedale Primary/College, Oberon Primary and Mandama Primary.
5 mins to Waurn ponds or Marshall Train Station for Melbourne commuters, Ring Road access to Melbourne in 50mins, 12mins to Geelong CBD or 16mins to Torquay Surf coast.
For more information please call Julia Warren anytime on 0432 182 271.
Insights: 3 Durban Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Address: 35 Golf Links Road Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
An Entertainers Paradise
The Feel:
Classic beach house vibes are felt throughout this beautiful, fantastically positioned three bedroom home, set on a large block with established gardens. An abundance of interior space is amplified by high ceilings and expansive glazing, with seamless flow onto the sunny entertaining deck overlooking the grassy backyard completing this entertainers haven.
The Facts:
-Brightly lit OP kitchen, living and dining area
-Copious amounts of interior entertaining space
-Galley kitchen with stone benchtops and SS apps
-Seamless flow to the large and sunny NF deck
-Fantastic grassy back garden for children and pets
-Privatised master suite with WIR and ensuite
-Upper level living area, large balcony, main bath and sep. W.C
-2 further BRs with BIRs to the upper level
-High ceilings and hardwood timber floors
-Outdoor shower, LUG and secure fencing
-Ducted gas heating, evap.cooling and gas log fire
-500m from the Barwon Heads Primary School
-A short distance from the river, surf beaches and golf links
-An easy stroll to the shops and practical facilities
-Fantastic lock up and leave holiday home
The Owner Loves:
Weve loved the open spaciousness of our home here and how easy it makes it to entertain large groups inside and out. Being a short distance to the river, beach, golf links and village centre, we can leave the car at home and walk to everything with ease.

Description:
Practical family living - walk everywhere.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Constantine on 0401 393 993 or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Perfectly positioned within a blue-chip Belmont location and providing everything for the growing family this delightful residence is not to be missed. Within close proximity to a range of services ease of day to living is assured.
Consisting of three spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, light filled open plan kitchen, dining, lounge and family room leading to alfresco entertaining. Beautifully maintained the home features ducted climate control system, double garage with direct internal access, wide rear lane access with extra carport plus garage providing abundant storage options. Situated on a large allotment of approx. 733sqm with fully landscaped gardens front and rear.
Located within walking distance to High Street Shopping, Roslyn Primary School, Belmont High School, public transport and only a short hop to Highton Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour. Ever popular Belmont continues to see huge interest and even bigger growthnow is the time to secure your position!

Description:
A Rare Opportunity in Blue-Chip Belmont
Situated in one of Belmonts most coveted pockets on 594 m2 (approx.), this unique character home provides endless opportunities for the astute buyer. The property makes an ideal family home, investment property or renovators dream with the potential to subdivide (STCA).
Treat yourself to the lifestyle youve been dreaming of in a simply superb location. A short walk to High St shopping precinct takes care of all your shopping needs. Only minutes away from Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Geelong CBD and the ring road for Melbourne commuters. Families will appreciate easy access to a selection of schools, including zoning for the renown Belmont High school, while the sun-soaked backyard creates a generous play space for children and pets alike!
- Three bedrooms all with built in robes
- Lovely light filled main living space with classic narrow hardwood polished boards. Extends to a private light filled deck court yard with large glass doors.
- Generous separate dining room
- Kitchen with Bosch dishwasher and gas oven overlooking court yard
- Bathroom with bath and separate shower
- Separate laundry to the rear of the house
- Secure gated single car garage/shed and off street parking
- Gas log fire and Daikin reverse cycle split system
This property is a must to inspect, dont you be the one to miss out!

Description:
Convenient Low Maintenance Living
Impeccability presented with incredible street appeal this townhouse is modern, with beautiful neutral tones and stylish quality fixtures throughout. As you enter youre greeted with Tasmanian Oak hardwood floorboards, moving into the spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The kitchen features stone bench tops, walk in pantry and Siemens appliances, including gas cook top, electric oven and dishwasher. Upstairs offers 3 bedrooms, the master with balcony access, walk in robe and a generous ensuite with double vanity, bath and walk in shower. The remaining bedrooms are both serviced by the conveniently located central bathroom.
Extras Include
- Ducted heating
- Refrigerated cooling
- Double glazing
- Oversized single remote garage
- European laundry
- Downstairs powder room
- Study nook
- Undercover decked alfresco
- Landscaped gardens with water tank and pump
An incredible opportunity to purchase this impeccable townhouse awaits, ideally located in a no thru street, walking distance to nearby schools, Highton Village and public transport. Opportunities like this dont last long.

Description:
Huge Potential on Generous Allotment
Presenting a great opportunity to enter into the market or a timely addition to your investment portfolio, this classic Belmont home is positioned close to all the action and would respond exceptionally well to a modern transformation if you so desire. Underpinning your prospective purchase is a generous 653sqm (approx.) with a North-facing backyard, further lending itself for future re-development opportunity (STCA.).
Entering the home you will be greeted by the traditional formal lounge room that boasts plenty of natural light. Adjacent to this is the functional kitchen and meals area.
Completing the home is three well-sized bedrooms all complete with BIR's, in addition a fourth bedroom at the rear of the home with the flexibility to be a second living or rumpus area. The main central bathroom services the home with ease.
You will find yourself located only moments from the High Street shopping precinct, Highton Shopping Village, local schools plus quick access to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital.
Features:
Single garage
Single Carport

Description:
Please Contact Us to Book a Private Inspection
If you are searching for that rare small home on a modest smart block then your search is over. Set amongst other quality homes in a quiet court is this three bedroom townhouse that has a two way bathroom to the master bedroom that doubles as an ensuite. The spacious open plan living area with R/C air conditioner adjoins a stylish kitchen complete with dishwasher, whilst a large undercover area caters perfectly for year round entertaining. With direct entry to the home from the garage, privacy, security and low maintenance living is yours with this most sought after home in a choice location. Don't let this one pass you by.

Description:
Terrific Terrace living!
Youll love:
This modern 2-storey, 2-bedroom terrace boasting spacious low-maintenance living in the heart of the Sands Estate & comes with exclusive resort lifestyle benefits like use of an outdoor pool, tennis court & more.
The light & breezy flow of the open plan kitchen, living & dining area on the ground floor and how the private courtyards at either end ideally capture both the morning & afternoon sun.
Other quality features such as the Caesarstone benchtops & SMEG appliances in the kitchen, plus the ducted heating & cooling throughout.
Plus:
Both bedrooms are full-sized & feature generous robes the master with ensuite, WIRs & a private balcony.
Upstairs also features the main bathroom plus a European laundry; while downstairs has a separate powder room with additional storage options located on both levels.
Theres undercover parking for 1 car, plus an outdoor storage shed & additional parking for visitors too.
Located an easy walk from Peppers Resort & the beach this property will suit buyers looking for an affordable & low-maintenance lifestyle, quality lock up & leave weekender or a great Airbnb investment opportunity!
